contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "wealthy" refers to wealthy people. Alternate translation: "the wealthy people who sat with Naboth" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-nominaladj]])
contextId.glQuote: the wealthy who sat with him

contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "wealthy" refers to wealthy people. Alternate translation: "the wealthy people who lived in Naboth's city" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-nominaladj]])
contextId.glQuote: the wealthy who lived in Naboth's city
